Q_DESC:
Create a class called item representing no. of items (int), item code (int) and price (float). Also, define the following member functions.
initialize(): to initialize no. of items and read item code and price.
largest(): to find and return an item with largest price.
sum(): to calculate and return the sum of prices of all items; and 
displayitems(): to display all items with code and price.

Input:
The no. of items must be less than or equal to 10

1.The first line of the input must contain the no. of items.

2. The subsequent lines must contain item code and price for each item.

Output:
The output must print the largest price among all items, the total price of all items and print all items with code and price.
TESTCASE_1:
2
12 23.60
234 45
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Largest Price=45
Sum of Prices=68.6
Code and Price
12 and 23.6
234 and 45
TESTCASE_3:
3
345 233
122 56.25
67 1025
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Largest Price=1025
Sum of Prices=1314.25
Code and Price
345 and 233
122 and 56.25
67 and 1025
